title.en: Cook Ikezaki's Justice! King of Cheap Sweets!! Let's all Enjoy it!!

altTitles.ja: マンガでわかる! 代からのビジネスブック 将来お金で苦労しない7つの方法
クック池崎のジャスティス！駄菓子クッ王！！

description.en:
Sunshine Ikezaki has finally been made into a manga!!

YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!

Broadcasting on the TV Tokyo network "Cook Ikezaki'' is a candy cooking character from ``Oha Suta''!!
He shows off various dishes using candy and solves problems at school!?

The chaotic development that is not typical of a gourmet manga is just one of the stories of Sunshine Ikezaki!!

The collaboration manga between Oha Suta and CoroCoro has been turned into a comic!!

Sunshine Ikezaki, who is also known as a big fan of manga, has finally turned into a manga!

[Recommended information from the editor] Cook Ikezaki, a project in "Oha Suta"! Cook Ikezaki himself had wanted to make it into a manga from the time it first appeared. The author, Chihiro Mizune, saw this and made a fierce attack on the CoroCoro Comic editorial department!! The work has progressed steadily from being read as a one-shot in the Bessatsu CoroCoro Comic, to being serialized in the Bessatsu Coro, and then to being published as a web manga. And finally, it's been made into a comic! It's been quite a while since we made it into a comic as a manga project in collaboration with Oha Star. Please enjoy the harmony of Mr. Ikezaki's gag, which has a sunshine color under his supervision, while also having the touch of Mr. Mikoto's gag and the drawing of the seven changes!!
